BEFORE:
self.conv = nn.Sequential(  # with batchnorm
            nn.Conv2d(n_channel, 128, 7, padding=3),
            nn.BatchNorm2d(128),
            nn.ReLU(),
            nn.Conv2d(128, 128, 7, padding=3),
            nn.BatchNorm2d(128),
            nn.ReLU(),
            nn.Conv2d(128, 64, 7, padding=3),
            nn.BatchNorm2d(64),
            nn.ReLU(),
            nn.Conv2d(64, 16, 7, padding=3),
            nn.BatchNorm2d(16),
            nn.ReLU(),
            nn.Conv2d(16, n_channel, 3, padding=1),
        )
AFTER:

            blk(n_channel, 64),
            blk(64, 128),
            blk(128, 256),
            blk(256, 512),
            blk(512, 256),
            blk(256, 128),
